name: TheGame (162007)
description:
TheGame is a game that combines strategy, drawing skills, and simplicity in an arcade-type setting. Each player will have to draw their way to reach the destination (The Black Dot). Once the drawing is complete, press space, and a sled will fall and move through the path that you drew. (Game inspired by Line Rider)

Press space to go

Press R to restart

Dude I know there's a bug with level saves but I'm to lazy to fix it so please leave me alone.
